extendedInfo.description: If you are Depeche Mode's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Depeche Mode's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Depeche Mode's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Depeche Mode's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Speak & Spell- A Broken Frame- Construction Time Again- Some Great Reward- Black Celebration- Music for the Masses- Violator- Songs of Faith and Devotion- Ultra- Exciter- Playing the Angel- Sounds of the Universe- Delta Machine************************List of lyrics ************************- A Pain That I'm Used To- A Photograph Of You- A Question Of Lust- A Question Of Time- All That's Mine- Alone- Always- And Then...- Angel- Any Second Now- Barrel Of A Gun- Behind The Wheel- Black Celebration- Blasphemous Rumours- Blue Dress- Boys Say Go!- Breathe- Broken- But Not Tonight- Clean- Comatose- Come Back- Condemnation- Corrupt- Damaged People- Dream On- Dreaming Of Me- Dressed In Black- Enjoy The Silence- Everything Counts- Fly On The Windscreen- Fragile Tension- Freelove- Freestate- Get Right With Me-
